docs.snippet: If we don’t act, the region’s problems will arrive at our door....
docs.lead_paragraph: If we don’t act, the region’s problems will arrive at our door.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr holds that tremendous problems facing El Salvador, Guatemala and Honduras can be addressed given sustained effort that has been forthcoming from their leaders and help from United States; contends America's fortunes are linked to those of South America, ignoring their problems brings them to US doorstep; urges Congress to approve $1 billion Pres Obama has requested to make reforms in South America, saying failure to do so will cost far more.

headline.main: Joe Biden: A Plan for Central America

docs.snippet: It was bad enough when France learned that the minute of silence for victims of the nation's deadliest terror attacks in decades was not respected by all students. Some children contested it, others walked out. But when an 8-year old Muslim boy pr...
docs.lead_paragraph: It was bad enough when France learned that the minute of silence for victims of the nation's deadliest terror attacks in decades was not respected by all students. Some children contested it, others walked out. But when an 8-year old Muslim boy proclaimed, "I am with the terrorists," the alarm bells sounded at full strength.

headline.main: French Fracture Laid Bare as 8-Year-Old Praises Terrorists
headline.print_headline: French Fracture Laid Bare as 8-Year-Old Praises Terrorists
